verbose_text: In contrast to the fact that trypanosome-susceptible BALB/c mice can be altered to a relatively resistant like phenotype by neutralization of IFN-gamma, enhancing the production of IFN-gamma by blocking IL-10R during T. congolense or T. brucei brucei infections can also switch the resistant C57BL/6 mice to a susceptible like phenotype.
evidence: IFN-gamma              , enhancing the production of IFN-gamma by blocking IL-10R
